mapper.select:
SELECT `id`, `ip`, `port`, `name`, `version`, `os_id` as osId, `os_type` as osType, `os_version` as osVersion, `osbit`, `credential`, `runner_id` as runnerId, `runner_group_id` as runnerGroupId, `runner_ip` as runnerIp, `runner_port` as runnerPort, `user`, `pcpu`, `mem`, `status`, `fcd`, `lcd` FROM `tagent`
LIMIT #{startNum}, #{pageSize}
